org.jbei.ice.lib.bulkupload

Class BulkUploadController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jbei.ice.lib.bulkupload.BulkUploadController

  • public class BulkUploadController
extends Object
    Controller for dealing with bulk imports (including drafts)
    Author:
    Hector Plahar

      • BulkUploadController

        public BulkUploadController()

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public BulkUploadInfo create(String userId,
                    BulkUploadInfo info)
        Creates a new bulk upload. If upload type is not bulk edit, then the status is set to in progress. Default permissions consisting of read permissions for the public groups that the requesting user is a part of are added
        Parameters:
        userId - identifier for user making request
        info - bulk upload data
        Returns:
        created upload

      • getPendingImports

        public HashMap<String,ArrayList<BulkUploadInfo>> getPendingImports(String userId)
        Retrieves list of bulk imports that are owned by the system. System ownership is assigned to all bulk imports that are submitted by non-admins and indicates that it is pending approval.

        Administrative privileges are required for making this call

        Parameters:
        userId - account for user making request; expected to be an administrator
        Returns:
        list of bulk imports pending verification

      • getBulkImport

        public BulkUploadInfo getBulkImport(String userId,
                           long id,
                           int offset,
                           int limit)
        Retrieves bulk import and entries associated with it that are referenced by the id in the parameter. Only owners or administrators are allowed to retrieve bulk imports
        Parameters:
        userId - identifier for account of user requesting
        id - unique identifier for bulk import
        offset - offset for upload entries (start)
        limit - maximum number of entries to return with the upload
        Returns:
        data transfer object with the retrieved bulk import data and associated entries
        Throws:
        PermissionException

      • setFileData

        protected PartData setFileData(String userId,
                   Entry entry,
                   PartData partData)

      • retrieveByUser

        public ArrayList<BulkUploadInfo> retrieveByUser(String requesterId,
                                       String userAccountId)
        Retrieves list of user saved bulk imports. Only the owner or an administrator can retrieve it
        Parameters:
        requesterId - account of requesting user
        userAccountId - account identifier for user whose saved drafts are being requested
        Returns:
        list of draft infos representing saved drafts.

      • getPendingUploads

        public ArrayList<BulkUploadInfo> getPendingUploads(String userId)

      • deleteDraftById

        public BulkUploadInfo deleteDraftById(String userId,
                             long draftId)
                               throws PermissionException
        Deletes a bulk import draft referenced by a unique identifier. only owners of the bulk import or administrators are permitted to delete bulk imports
        Parameters:
        userId - account of user making the request
        draftId - unique identifier for bulk import
        Returns:
        deleted bulk import
        Throws:
        PermissionException

      • autoUpdateBulkUpload

        public BulkUploadAutoUpdate autoUpdateBulkUpload(String userId,
                                        BulkUploadAutoUpdate autoUpdate,
                                        EntryType addType)

      • submitBulkImportDraft

        public BulkUploadInfo submitBulkImportDraft(String userId,
                                   long draftId)
                                     throws PermissionException
        Submits a bulk import that has been saved. This action is restricted to the owner of the draft or to administrators.
        Parameters:
        userId - Account identifier of user performing save
        draftId - unique identifier for saved bulk import
        Returns:
        true, if draft was sa
        Throws:
        PermissionException

      • revertSubmitted

        public boolean revertSubmitted(Account account,
                      long uploadId)
                        throws ControllerException
        Throws:
        ControllerException

        public List<AccessPermission> getUploadPermissions(String userId,
                                          long uploadId)

      • addPermission

        public AccessPermission addPermission(String userId,
                             long uploadId,
                             AccessPermission access)
        Adds specified access permission to the bulk upload.
        Parameters:
        userId - unique identifier of user making the request. Must be an admin or owner of the upload
        uploadId - unique identifier for bulk upload
        access - details about the permission to the added
        Returns:
        added permission with identifier that can be used to remove/delete the permission
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the upload cannot be located using its identifier

      • deletePermission

        public boolean deletePermission(String userId,
                       long uploadId,
                       long permissionId)
        Removes specified permission from bulk upload
        Parameters:
        userId - unique identifier of user making the request. Must be an admin or owner of the bulk upload
        uploadId - unique identifier for bulk upload
        permissionId - unique identifier for permission that has been previously added to upload
        Returns:
        true if deletion is successful
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if upload or permission cannot be located by their identifiers
